website_summaries.verdict: Earns praise for its beauty, but it's one of the higher-priced Micheal Kors wallets though the design is no better than others on our list.
pros: Stands out for the genuine leather that has a classy pebbled finish
Has ample pockets for cards and cash, and fits most cell phones
cons: The interior pocket zipper is in an awkward position and tends to come unzipped
The costliest wallet on our list

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to match my purse. It is authentic. Much cheaper on Amazon than in the stores. I'm sure this price won't last long. I've placed items on my wish list before and after a short while, the price goes back up.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly

customer_reviews.title: Not the color I was expecting. Thinking about it ...
customer_reviews.text: Not the color I was expecting. Thinking about it back. I thought it was purple it more wine or cherry than purple
customer_reviews.author: Gevonder W. DuPree

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet
customer_reviews.text: It’s very beautiful and can hold a lot of stuff. I’ve been using it for a Long time and it still looks brand new!
customer_reviews.author: CrazyCatLady

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Favorite style wallet. I ordered the "luggage" color and it matches my "luggage" Jet Set Travel Medium Multifunction Tote perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Toto

customer_reviews.title: Knock Of MK Wallet! Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: It's a FAKE! Read the card that came with it and see all the red flags!
customer_reviews.author: Mfish

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet! Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: Great Wallet! Everything I expected. Zipper is smooth and there is plenty of credit card spaces and room for everything your wallet should hold. I bought my color in luggage and it was amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Beviejoe

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and I still love it
customer_reviews.text: The chili colored wallet is not the picture shown. The color is much darker. I'm not sure if the pictures are backwards for the colors but the chili wallet is the color of the wallet posted for "watermelon". Very good quality and I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Swogger

customer_reviews.title: Love the wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love the wallet. Michael Kors products are quality item. I have received so many compliments on my wallet from the next person in line at the grocery store. It i the perfect shade of red!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Sartin

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I just looove this wallet. I bought the pink one and it's gorgeous. VERY durable zipper and what I love is that if I don't want to carry my MK handbag I can just carry this wallet as a clutch. LOOVE the wallet, just not the price...lol
customer_reviews.author: Queen B

customer_reviews.title: She Loved It
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my niece. She loved it. Really don't know much more than that as I am not the one using it. I just know she was super excited to get it and I'm the best Aunt ever now.
customer_reviews.author: kjw

product_meta.title: MICHAEL Michael Kors Women's Jet Set Zip Around Continental Wallet
product_meta.description: Sophisticated saffiano leather composes this classic MICHAEL Michael Kors continental wallet. The wraparound zip opens to a dividing zip pouch, 2 bill pockets, and 8 card slots. Gold-tone hardware.
feature_bullets: pockets: 5 in slip, 1 in zip, 1 id windows, 16 card slots
